title: We Need To Talk About The VAUGHAN CONDO SHOOTING That KILLED 5 (Including Board Members) In Ontario!
cleaned_text:
On Sunday December 18th a 73 year old condo resident turned gunman killed 5 people in their apartments, targeting members of the board who he was engaged in a legal battle with.

“I did not have to do this. If you would have give me some comfort in my home, that’s all I want, comfort in my home. Why’s it been denied? For seven years. Why? You bastards all of you,” he said.

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth explains what he thinks are the root causes for this tragedy and also what can be done to prevent it from happening again.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
